reasoning: BEST1-associated vitelliform macular dystrophy is a rare form of inherited retinal dystrophy with variable expressivity. Estimated prevalence 2-4 per 100k population based on genetic studies of retinal dystrophy cohorts. Multifocal variant is less common than classic Best disease.
source: Hariri AH et al. Quantification of retinal abnormalities in Best disease with multimodal imaging. Retina. 2013; Zernant J et al. Genotype-phenotype correlations and progression of Best vitelliform macular dystrophy. Ophthalmology. 2012
